column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Who are you ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " What do you guys think you 're doing !?
#Text=" Aang says : " I was chasing some girl .
#Text=" Katara says : " What girl ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I heard laughing and I saw some girl in a fancy dress .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , there must be a tea party here and we just did n't get our invitations !
#Text=" Katara says : " I thought I saw Mom .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , we were all just scared and hungry and our minds were playing tricks on us .
#Text=That 's why we all saw things out here .
#Text=" Katara says : " You saw something too ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I thought I saw Yue .
#Text=But , that does n't prove anything .
#Text=Look , I think about her all the time , and you saw Mom , someone you miss a lot .
#Text=" Aang says : " What about me ?
#Text=I did n't know the girl I saw .
#Text=And all our visions led us right here .
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay ... so where 's here ?
#Text=The middle of the swamp ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , the center ... it 's the heart of the swamp .
#Text=It 's been calling us here .
#Text=I knew it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's just a tree .
#Text=It ca n't call anyone .
#Text=For the last time , there 's nothing after us and there 's nothing magical happening here .
#Text="
